success.description: Whether this operation was processed successfully

available.description: The available balance of this account

locked.description: The locked balance of this account

internalTransactionCount.description: The number of internal transactions received/sent

pendingTransactionCount.description: The number of pending transaction from/to this account

view.description: The view number. # of additional BFT rounds to generated this block

parentHash.description: The hash of the parent block

timestamp.description: Block timestamp in milliseconds specified by the block producer.

transactionsRoot.description: The Merkle root hash of the transactions

resultsRoot.description: The Merkle root hash of the results

stateRoot.description: The state root hash. Not enabled yet!

data.description: The extra data of this block

transactions.description: A list of transaction in the block

result.description: The address of the newly created account

blocksForged.description: The number of blocks produced by this delegate

turnsHit.description: Forged blocks when the delegate is a primary validator

turnsMissed.description: Missed blocks when the delegate is a primary validator

validator.description: Whether the delegate is currently a validator

votes.description: Total votes from this account to the delegate

result.description: The number of the latest block

coinbase.description: The address used for establishing connections to the network

latestBlockNumber.description: The number of the last block

latestBlockHash.description: The hash of the last block

activePeers.description: The number of actively connected peers

pendingTransactions.description: The number of transactions in pending pool

clientId.description: The client the peer is using

latestBlockNumber.description: The latest block number of the peer

latency.description: Latency between this node and the peer

capabilities.description: The features supported by the peer

result.description: The message signature encoded in hexadecimal string

maxTransactionDataSize.description: The maximum transaction size in bytes

minTransactionFee.description: The minimum transaction fee in nano SEM

minDelegateBurnAmount.description: The amount of nano SEM required to burn for delegate registration

fee.description: Transaction fee in nano SEM. For CREATE/CALL, this field is zero; use gas instead

timestamp.description: Transaction timestamp in milliseconds specified by the sender. There can be a time drift up to 2 hours.

data.description: Transaction data encoded in hexadecimal string

gas.description: The gas limit set by the sender

gasPrice.description: The gas Price set by the sender

blockNumber.description: The number of block that included the transaction

logs.description: Logs produced when executing this transaction

returnData.description: Return data encoded in hexadecimal string

contractAddress.description: Contract address if this is a CREATE transaction, or NULL

gas.description: The gas limit set by the sender

gasPrice.description: The gas Price set by the sender

gasUsed.description: The gas consumed. For non-VM transactions, this field is zero

fee.description: The transaction fee in nano SEM. For VM transactions, this field is zero

internalTransactions.description: Internal transactions generated when executing this transaction

type.description: Call type, possibly CALL, DELEGATECALL, CALLCODE, CREATE, CREATE2

value.description: The value being passed, in nano SEM

data.description: The data being passed, in hexadecimal string
Log data encoded in hexadecimal string

topics.description: Log topics encoded in hexadecimal string

result.description: The composed raw transaction encoded in hexadecimal string
The signed raw transaction encoded in hexadecimal string

startingHeight.description: The block height at which the sync started

info.description: Semux is an experimental high-performance blockchain platform that powers decentralized application.
info.title: Semux API

post.description: Adds a node to node manager.

parameters.name: node
parameters.description: Address of the node in host:port format

post.description: Adds an IP address to blacklist.

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: IP address

post.description: Adds an IP address to whitelist.

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: IP address

get.description: Returns an account.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Address of account

post.description: Creates a new account by generating a new private key or importing an existing private key when parameter 'privateKey' is provided.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Assigned alias to the created account.

parameters.name: privateKey
parameters.description: The private key to be imported, create a new key if omitted

delete.description: Deletes an account from this wallet.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Address of the account

get.description: Returns a delegate.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Delegate address

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Address of account

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Starting range of transactions

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Ending range of transactions

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Address of account

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Starting range of transactions

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Ending range of transactions

get.summary: Get pending transactions of the account

parameters.name: address

parameters.description: Starting range of transactions

parameters.description: Ending range of transactions

get.description: Returns votes from the account.

parameters.description: Address of account

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Number of block

Returns a transactions if exists.

parameters.description: Delegate address

parameters.description: Signing address. The address must exist in the wallet.data of this Semux node.

parameters.description: Message to sign in UTF-8 string

parameters.description: Address of the message signer

parameters.description: Message in UTF-8 string

parameters.name: signature
parameters.description: Signature to verify

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Sender's address. The account must exist in the wallet of this node.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Recipient's address

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Amount of value to transfer in nano SEM

parameters.name: fee
parameters.description: Transaction fee in nano SEM, default to minimum fee if omitted

parameters.name: nonce
parameters.description: Transaction nonce, default to sender's nonce if omitted

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Transaction data encoded in hexadecimal string

parameters.description: Raw transaction encoded in hexadecimal string.

get.description: Executes a new message call immediately without creating a transaction on the block chain.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Sender's address. The address must exist in the wallet.data of this Semux node.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Recipient's address (the contract address)

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Amount of value to transfer in nano SEM

parameters.name: nonce
parameters.description: Transaction nonce, default to sender's nonce if omitted

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Transaction data encoded in hexadecimal string

parameters.name: gas
parameters.description: The gas limit for the call

parameters.name: gasPrice
parameters.description: The gas price in nanoSEM

get.description: Estimate the gas usage of a transaction.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Sender's address. The address must exist in the wallet.data of this Semux node.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Recipient's address (the contract address)

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Amount of value to transfer in nano SEM

parameters.name: nonce
parameters.description: Transaction nonce, default to sender's nonce if omitted

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Transaction data encoded in hexadecimal string

parameters.name: gas
parameters.description: The gas limit for the call

parameters.name: gasPrice
parameters.description: The gas price in SEM

get.description: Compose an unsigned raw transaction then return its hexadecimal encoded string. An unsigned raw transaction can be signed using /sign-raw-transaction API.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Network name

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Transaction type

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Recipient's address

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Amount of value to transfer in nano SEM

parameters.name: fee
parameters.description: Transaction fee in nano SEM, default to minimum fee if omitted

parameters.name: nonce
parameters.description: Transaction nonce, default to sender's nonce if omitted

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Transaction timestamp in milliseconds. Default to current time.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Hexadecimal encoded transaction data.

parameters.name: gas
parameters.description: The gas limit for the call

parameters.name: gasPrice
parameters.description: The gas price

get.description: Sign an unsigned raw transaction then return its hexadecimal encoded string. An unsigned raw transaction can be created using /compose-raw-transaction API.

parameters.name: raw
parameters.description: Unsigned raw transaction encoded in hexadecimal string.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Signer's address. This address must exist in the wallet.

get.description: Returns an object with data about the sync status

200.description: An object about the current sync status
